name: Codes for Healthcare Personnel Influenza Vaccination (HP FLU) Summary Data

concept.display: Staff [#] who worked at facility at least one day from October 1 through March 31
Staff [#] who received influenza vaccination at the facility
Staff [#] who provided documentation of influenza vaccine receipt
Staff [#] who had a medical contraindication to the influenza vaccine
Staff [#] with unknown influenza vaccination status
